name: UI Streamlit Implementation
requirements: Module must provide a Streamlit UI implementation file
UI components must be registered using the standard pattern
All UI elements must have proper type, id, display_name, and render_function
documentation: Ensures modules provide proper Streamlit UI implementation with standard component registration pattern. Modules with UI functionality must implement ui/ui_streamlit.py with register_components() function that uses ui_context.register_element() to register UI components.
